org.youscope.clientinterfaces

Interface YouScopeClient


  • public interface YouScopeClient
    Interface through which an addon can access the client.
    Author:
    langmo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      YouScopeFrame createFrame()
      Creates a new content window.
      boolean editMeasurement(MeasurementConfiguration configuration)
      Opens the default editor to manipulate the measurement configuration.
      ClientAddonProvider getAddonProvider()
      Returns a class with which client addons can be constructed.
      MeasurementConfiguration[] getLastSavedMeasurements()
      Returns a list of the last saved mesurements.
      YouScopeProperties getProperties()
      Returns an interface through which an addon can save properties as well as access the properties of the YouScope client.
      boolean initializeMeasurement(Measurement measurement)
      Opens the measurement control frame for a measurement.
      Measurement initializeMeasurement(MeasurementConfiguration configuration)
      Initializes the measurement and shows the measurement control frame.
      boolean isLocalServer()
      Returns true if the microscope is connected to this computer, and false, if the microscope is on a different computer.
      void sendError(java.lang.String message)
      Notifies the client that an error occurred, such that the client can notify the user in the client specific way.
      void sendError(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Throwable error)
      Notifies the client that an error occurred, such that the client can notify the user in the client specific way.
      void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Sends a human readable message to the client, which (may) be displayed to the user in the client specific way.

    • Method Detail

      • getProperties

        YouScopeProperties getProperties()
        Returns an interface through which an addon can save properties as well as access the properties of the YouScope client.
        Returns:
        Interface to save and load properties.

      • createFrame

        YouScopeFrame createFrame()
        Creates a new content window. The content window is usually either a frame or an internal frame (default).
        Returns:
        New Frame.

      • getLastSavedMeasurements

        MeasurementConfiguration[] getLastSavedMeasurements()
        Returns a list of the last saved mesurements.
        Returns:
        The list of measurements.

      • sendError

        void sendError(java.lang.String message,
               java.lang.Throwable error)
        Notifies the client that an error occurred, such that the client can notify the user in the client specific way.
        Parameters:
        message - Description of the error.
        error - The error.

      • sendError

        void sendError(java.lang.String message)
        Notifies the client that an error occurred, such that the client can notify the user in the client specific way.
        Parameters:
        message - Description of the error.

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Sends a human readable message to the client, which (may) be displayed to the user in the client specific way.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to send to the client.

      • isLocalServer

        boolean isLocalServer()
        Returns true if the microscope is connected to this computer, and false, if the microscope is on a different computer.
        Returns:
        True if the microscope is connected to this computer, and false, if the microscope is on a different computer.

      • editMeasurement

        boolean editMeasurement(MeasurementConfiguration configuration)
        Opens the default editor to manipulate the measurement configuration.
        Parameters:
        configuration - The configuration of the measurement to edit.
        Returns:
        True if editor could be opened, wrong otherwise.

      • initializeMeasurement

        Measurement initializeMeasurement(MeasurementConfiguration configuration)
        Initializes the measurement and shows the measurement control frame.
        Parameters:
        configuration - The configuration of the measurement.
        Returns:
        The initialized measurement, or null if not successful.

      • initializeMeasurement

        boolean initializeMeasurement(Measurement measurement)
        Opens the measurement control frame for a measurement.
        Parameters:
        measurement - The measurement to control.
        Returns:
        True if successful, false otherwise.

      • getAddonProvider

        ClientAddonProvider getAddonProvider()
        Returns a class with which client addons can be constructed.
        Returns:
        client addon provider.
